tool.name: Circos: Resample 1/2D data
tool.description: reduce numbers of points in a dataset before plotting.
tool.help:
From the script's documentation:
The data resolution in a figure is limited by the output print, or screen, resolution and our own visual acuity.
To read more about how these limits affect figure design, see `this page <http://mkweb.bcgsc.ca/images/resolution/visual-acuity-sequence-visualization.pdf>`__
This script is designed to convert very high-resolution data tracks to low-resolution equivalents which are easier to interpret and faster to draw.
